text: Those with land can work on their plots

text: I wanted to join the police force
We are studying in order to get a government job which has both money and security
Boys should join the army and serve the nation
We can also join the police force and serve the nation

text: Boys can join politics and help the country on its progress path
They would much rather work at a salon or in the factory than in agriculture
keyword: work at a salon or in the factory

text: We will not get good jobs if we don’t study
Education is the first step to success in both professional and personal lives
keyword: success in both professional and personal lives

text: We will get god [good] jobs only if we have knowledge of computers
Technical education is very important to get a good cushy job

text: Girls should also be allowed technical education so that they can also get good job and help their parents and families
We are still studying but we want good well-paying jobs when we finish our education
I want to work and save some money and then start my own business
Both should be allowed to do whatever they want
comments: in relation to occupational aspirations

text: Parents will forbid her from doing so

text: There are some things which are social taboos for women such as selling at the marketplace
comments: assuming they refer to a mobility constraint

text: How can he allow her to sell; she will be the only woman in a place full of men and everyone will make fun of her
keyword: only woman in a place full of men

text: Young married women go to the market only with their husbands
Their in laws and husbands will not let them go alone
keyword: will not let them go alone

text: That is a long practiced culture in our village which keeps newly married women under veils
keyword: keeps newly married women under veils

text: No woman sells in the market; only men trade in the market; if a woman went to the marketplace then everyone would just stop to stare at her making her feel very uncomfortable and she would have to return home; so there is no point in a woman trying to sell at the marketplace
keyword: No woman sells in the market

text: There is a lot of rowdiness and abusive language used at the marketplace and women will themselves feel out of place in such an environment
keyword: women will themselves feel out of place

text: Her family will never allow her to do any such thing
Women don’t sell at the local market
keyword: Women don’t sell at the local market

text: The only long followed practiced handed down by generations is to keep newly married women under veils and indoors
keyword: keep newly married women under veils and indoors

text:
He may allow her to join such a group
	There is no harm in working in a group; he may not have allowed her if she had wanted to do it alone
keyword: no harm in working in a group
comments: assuming this speaks to a mobility constraint allowing women to sell produce jointly but not alone

text: She can go alone if her intention is right
keyword: go alone if her intention is right
comments: assuming this speaks to a mobility constraint allowing women to sell produce jointly but not alone

text: There is no problem in going during the daytime; she may not be allowed outside alone after dark

text: Girls always go out in groups

keyword: hesitant about sending their girls alone

text: Older women are free to go wherever they want and whenever; they have been in the village long and know everybody
keyword: Older women are free to go wherever they want
comments: assuming this speaks to a mobility constraint allowing women to sell produce jointly but not alone

text: The local market is within the village and young women can easily walk to the market
keyword: young women can easily walk to the market

text: Young girls also move around freely
Boys mostly do all agricultural activities

text: Actually in the peak farming seasons such as paddy and wheat sowing and then harvesting there is a lot of work and we always help out our parents and others too

text: We can also drive tractor and other machines
Girls don’t do any agricultural activity
keyword: Girls don’t do any agricultural activity

text:
Since the advent of both these machines women don’t have to do any agricultural work
Women in our village don’t want to work in the fields and now they are happy

Women only go to the plot to deliver their husbands’ lunch

All family members help out on the plot on need basis

text:
David will sell
Diana will not even volunteer to sell since she knows the response

text: If they share a good understanding then they will help each other
Women do not have separate plots

keyword: he should be able to purchase a bike

text: At the end of the day it is a male dominated society and husband will have the final word

text: It is his father’s money to be used as he wants

text: He may or may not ask his wife; he has no obligation to ask his wife

text: Even if he asks his wife, the final decision will be his and he will buy the bike
His wife will not fight because she may not want to upset him and disturb the family peace
Generally there is a joint plot

keyword: glad that he allowed her to work

text: It is her inheritance and she can do whatever she wants with it

text: A man has his pride. Why will he take his wife’s money? She can use it anyway she likes

Yes, women do have the same opportunities as the men to learn and grow

Even women will laugh at her

People may not bother with him; they will scoff at him and then leave him alone

text:
But assuming she did want to grow her own crop she will definitely need to ask her husband and in laws
	She will also need to ask her son if he is grown up

text: Men will not consult their wives
keyword: Men will not consult their wives

text: She will definitely be asked to rein in her thoughts and banish all such ideas from her head
They will decide together; they have grown their crop together and therefore they will decide together

text: If she has been involved in agricultural activities then it is fair to assume she has a good idea and hence David will not mind implementing her idea
